attributes.action: Allow me to start a petition
attributes.additional_details: Start a review by electing a panel of politicians to review the status of the planning system and implement a strategy attracting qualified planners into the Council employment.
attributes.background:
Appoint a committee to overhaul the broken housing planning system
Council planning departments need more planning officers, to work at the Councils offices to determine planning applications on time.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  We're not sure whether you want to fund more planning officers or whether you want a review into local authority planning.  We can't publish petitions calling for reviews where the petition presupposes the outcome of the review. In those cases, we recommend people start petitions calling for the actual outcome they want to see. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
